description: I'm sure that you have heard of the popular snow cone. If not, it's a refreshing treat sold at many concession stands during summertime. The traditional recipe is made with water, sugar, and ice. This version is spiked to make for an even more enjoyable experience!
name: Spiked Snow Cones

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients and pour into a pitcher.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients and pour into a pitcher.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill the snow cone with ice using an ice cream scoop. Pack the ice to form a rounded heap at the top.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill the snow cone with ice using an ice cream scoop. Pack the ice to form a rounded heap at the top.

recipeInstructions.name: Drizzle the cocktail around the sides of the shaved ice until the cone is full, then drizzle a small amount on top for color.
recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the cocktail around the sides of the shaved ice until the cone is full, then drizzle a small amount on top for color.
